passages.full_quote: <used>It would have been a</used> market day in any case, but people were erecting benches as well and the Maypole was already up

passages.full_quote: To most people that <used>would have been a misfortune, but Miss Treason</used> was skilled at Borrowing, a particular witch talent
She'd met Nanny Ogg before and quite liked her<used>, but Miss Treason had said</used>, darkly, that Nanny Ogg was "a disgusting old baggage."

passages.full_quote: <used>Miss Treason had said no, but that had</used> been a long time ago and how could Miss Treason understand

Its normal course of action would be to roar and paw the ground a bit to get the targets running in an interesting way and its mind wasn't able to cope with this lack of attention, <used>but that hadn't been</used> its major problem, because its major problem had been twenty other bulls right behind it

passages.full_quote: Quite a lot of his life <used>that hadn't been spent at high speed had been passed within the walls of Unseen University, w</used>here women were broadly put in the same category as wallpaper or musical instruments-interesting in their way, and no doubt a small but important part of the proper structure of civilization but not, when you got right down to it, essential

passages.full_quote: Someone nudged the Archchancellor <used>of Unseen University, who had nodded off</used>
